projectDescription: an eCommerce website with basic features built using MERN (MySQL) stack.
a real-time web-based chat application built using Nextjs and Firebase.
EVSU Student Portal clone, got the data by scraping the content of the current system user. Built using nextjs for frontend and nodejs (express, request, cheerio) for backend.
an IMDB clone which is a progressive web application (PWA), got the data from TMDB API with the help of vue framework (nuxtjs).
a desktop application that will help you to segregate your scattered files in just one click, built with electronjs.
